**[EN-US]** - This project is an application inspired by **Spotify**! <img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/19/Spotify_logo_without_text.svg" width="20" height="20"></img> 
Developed to apply good practices in Vue 3, Pinia and Tailwind. The focus is on building a modern and interactive music player, prioritizing performance, usability and an intuitive interface.
- - -

## ðŸ”§ Como rodar o projeto / How to run the project

```sh
# Clone o repositÃ³rio / Clone the repo
$ git clone https://github.com/italoknd/SPOTIFY-CLONE-WITH-VUE-TAILWIND-PINIA.git

# Entre na pasta do projeto / Get into the project's folder
$ cd spotify-clone-with-vue-tailwind-and-pinia

# Instale as dependÃªncias com yarn ou npm, por exemplo 
#/Install the deps using yarn or npm (up to you)

# Instalando com yarn / Installing with yarn
$ yarn

# Instalando com npm / Installing with npm
$ npm i

# Rode o projeto com yarn ou npm / Run the project with yarn or npm

# Para rodar com o yarn, use: / Running with yarn
$ yarn dev

# Para rodar com o npm, use: / Running with npm
$ npm run dev
```
